bug.summary: Error if change to branch where active node doesn't exist
bug.description:
If you change to a branch where the current active node no longer exists, an exception is thrown: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4982789/66928850-a377aa80-eff7-11e9-9797-0d6967422e0c.png></denchmark-link>
As checking for updates does not depend on a specific node, the active node being non-existent should not be an issue...
